name: PlayTester (TGVoice)
description:
This game is best experienced with sound on.

Play Tester is a game submission to the GMTK 2021 game jam with the theme: Joined Together.

Navigate the broken landscape designed by a lazy developer. Join together with the narrator in anger over the lack of regular game systems, where your only source of movement is to fire an arrow joined to your waste with rope. Get to the end, and most importantly have fun!

Note for if you refuse to use sounds: Controls are disabled for the first 10 or so seconds. After which if you push the "D" key controls will be enabled.

All assets, art, music, and programming was done by me, TGVoice. This was a solo-dev project.
